Class Matrix3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix3D
  • class Matrix3D
extends Object
    A fairly conventional 3D matrix object that can transform sets of 3D points and perform a variety of manipulations on the transform

      • transform

        void transform​(float[] v,
               int[] tv,
               int nvert)
        Transform nvert points from v into tv. v contains the input coordinates in floating point. Three successive entries in the array constitute a point. tv ends up holding the transformed points as integers; three successive entries per point Looks like we could skip the copy phase at the beginning to increase speed
